ValidationRule.description: This rule looks at the Submission = Funded? field on the opp which is updated by a workflow on the submission object when a submission bank status is set to funded to True, and the Submission rollup field which counts how many submissions are in the Under
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before updating, set the appropriate Submission (in the Submissions Grid) to 'Funded', and make sure there are no Submissions in the Underwriting status.
